item.description:
Due to car troubles, I had to cancel this week's trivia. So, how about we try it again?

This is free trivia at a bar/pub. We can grab some food and drinks beforehand and then try our hands at trivia. It should be fun. :-)

Trivia is at 8:30 so let's meet 7:30 to grab some food/drinks!

It is at Half Door in Quincy. 1516 Hancock Street in Quincy.

Hope to see you guys there! :-)
item.name: Trivia Night - Half Door
